    Advisory

    Story title goes here

    At Vizient, we strive to help members solve the challenges we know affect the quality of clinical care and operational efficiency, making sure it is never compromised. Our consulting arm provides members with valuable data and insights and advisory services that are unmatched in the industry.

    Growth and strategy

    Our analytics and consulting services — paired with insights from the Vizient Research Institute — help members stay competitive, adapt to the changing health care environment and achieve their goals.

    Supply services & cost improvement

    We accelerate members' supply chain and operational performance through the scale of our purchasing power and our ability to reduce unnecessary variation, improve supply and resource utilization and streamline processes.

    Optimize operations and quality of care

    We work with members to develop clinical solutions that drive the highest quality care, delivered more effectively than ever before. Etiam dictum nisl magna, quis ultricies tellus sodales sed. Sed vulputate eget quam vel fringilla.

    Effective physician alignment

    As health care organizations' needs grow more complex and diverse, we are committed to expanding the ways in which members learn, improve and build together.

    Why Vizient?

    Vizient provides health care solutions that make a difference

    Vizient™ combines the strengths of VHA, University HealthSystem Consortium, Novation and MedAssets SCM and Sg2, trusted leaders focused on solving health care's most pressing challenges. We allow you to focus on what you do best: delivering exceptional, cost-effective care.

    View all press releases

    Better care leads to a better quality of life for everyone. With the collaborative power of Vizient’s expertise, solutions and unique insights, together we can achieve something greater.

    Curt NonomaquePresident and CEO, Vizient
